## CommonLineItemParams interface

Parameters common across all line item types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommonLineItemParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description?](./firestore-stripe-payments.commonlineitemparams.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The description for the line item, to be displayed on the Checkout page. |
|  [quantity?](./firestore-stripe-payments.commonlineitemparams.quantity.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The quantity of the line item being purchased. |
